GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Fix SCSI I/O completion and abort handler deadlock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 21c0d469349957b5dc811c41200a2a998996ca8d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: lpfc: Fix SCSI I/O completion and abort handler deadlock
